text: Richard Godfrey (by 1559 – 1631), of Salisbury, Wiltshire, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Salisbury in 1604.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1604-1629/member/godfrey- richard-i-1559-1631 ==References== Category:16th-century births Category:1631 deaths Category:Members of Parliament for Salisbury Category:English MPs 1604–1611
title: Richard Godfrey (died 1631)
